Moreover, the ego car might encounter sudden stops or reduced lanes near this vehicle. Keeping an appropriate distance and staying alert is crucial for safely navigating near construction machinery.

Use caution and consider lane changes if safe to do so, to maintain steady traffic flow and personal safety.
